landingPro.title2: Get the interest rate you want. No banks, no institutions. Think P2P.

what.desc0: Our peer-to-peer matching algorithm replaces the centralized inefficiency of the current banking system, allowing you to tap into true market demand.
what.desc1: Funds that have not yet been loaned out can be withdrawn at anytime.
what.desc2: When your money is on loan, it is protected by a smart contract that is over collateralized by crypto assets.  The smart contract will always run exactly as programmed.
what.desc3: For borrowers, Constant does not touch your collateral. It is securely stored in an Ethereum smart contract escrow.

faqs.question1: What is the difference between Constant and Constant Pro?
faqs.answer1: Constant Pro is designed for those who want a little more control over how they manage their money. Constant Pro gives users a full view of what’s going on behind the scenes – so they can examine real-time rates, choose which orders to match with, and secure the best outcomes.
faqs.question2: What does it mean to be fully secured?
faqs.answer2:
All investor funds are fully backed by collateral, and all portions that are not yet on loan benefit from our $130M insurance policy. Borrower collateral is stored safely in escrow, which means no one can touch it until it is transferred back to them after repayment.

Unlike other platforms, Constant also allows users to set their own interest rates and terms. Ethereum powered smart contracts automate the loan agreement and always run exactly as programmed – ensuring both investors and borrowers are protected.
faqs.question3: Is there a maximum or minimum amount for investing and borrowing?
faqs.answer3: There are no limits with Constant. You can invest or borrow as much or little as you like.
faqs.answer4:
We’ve taken important steps to safeguard not just your investment, but your returns, too.

All of our borrowers must put up 150% of the loan amount as crypto collateral. We also include a liquidation threshold to insure against a fall in the collateral’s value.

Your loan terms are hardcoded into an Ethereum smart contract that strictly defines how your money is used. When not on loan, we store your money in FDIC-insured bank accounts, overseen by Prime Trust, an accredited financial institution.

Combined, these protective measures ensure that no matter what happens – if the borrower doesn’t repay, the crypto market dips, or some other unfortunate event occurs – the return of your principal and profit is guaranteed.
faqs.answer5:
Investment funds are held in USD – other fiat currencies will be converted.

For borrower collateral, we accept BTC and ETH.

Loans are offered in USD, VND and Constant – the platform’s native stablecoin, pegged 1:1 with the USD.

getPrices.title: Pricing and Service times
getPrices.desc:
All times shown below are maximum estimates. In all cases, the team strives for ASAP.
While Constant processes your deposits and withdrawals free of charge, transaction fees may be applied separately by your financial institution.
getPrices.collateralIssue: * About collateral issue, please ping @andy_9210 on telegram to get direct support.
getPrices.withdrawFiatNote: * A receiving fee may be charged by your financial institutions.
getPrices.withdrawCryptoNote:
* Please note that $2,000 is a daily limitation on automated crypto withdrawal. If you withdraw more than that number, your withdrawal will need to be approved manually.

* $60,000 is the daily limitation for all the platform.

* Withdrawal fee for DAI is still kept at 3.5% until further notice.

* Network congestion on chains such as Ethereum or Binance may result in funds taking longer to arrive as well.

Service time guarantee ✔

Most stablecoin withdrawals take under an hour. Occasionally, we have to source extra liquidity but try to process your order as soon as possible (please refer to our service times). If there is any delay, we’ll pay you 12% APY on your withdrawal amount for every second we’re late.

getPrices.zelleDepositDelayIssue:
* Possible reasons for a delay in processing your Zelle deposit

- Missing relevant information to match with your deposit order: Name, User ID, Reference...

- Varying level of processing time by the bank.

- Transfering from an account with the account holder's name different than your registered name on Constant platform.

- Lack of or incorrect deposit order created prior to depositing.

faqs.answer1:
Flex is a deposit account that earns you 4% APY through automatic lending. When you deposit money into Flex, it goes into a liquidity pool managed by Compound Finance. Borrowers who’ve put up collateral can then secure loans from the pool in return for interest – and we pay that interest to you. Since your deposits go to a pool rather than individual borrowers, you can withdraw or deposit anytime, as often as you like, and without any fees.

How Flex works.
faqs.answer2: Compound Finance uses a blockchain protocol that intelligently manages the lending pool. It also sets interest rates according to supply and demand. At the moment, the rate is fixed at 4% APY. In the future, it could be higher or lower depending on activity in Compound’s lending market.
faqs.answer3:
Compound Finance is a technology that intelligently manages a lending pool of over $150 million in assets (as of September 2019). Flex interfaces with this technology through an API that allows you to withdraw your deposits and earned interest at any time.

Compound Finance lends in a similar way to banks: your deposits go in and are lent to borrowers in exchange for interest and collateral. But since Compound Finance is a technology, there is no need for branches or staff, so you enjoy a much better interest rate!

Learn more about Compound Finance.
faqs.question4: Do you have a referral program for Flex?
faqs.answer4: Yes, we do. For every friend you refer to Flex, you’ll get 10% of their interest earnings for the first year (up to a maximum of $1,000,000). For more details, visit your Referrals page.
faqs.answer5: Yes. Since you’re not lending your deposits to an individual, but to a lending pool, you can deposit or withdraw as much and as often as you like.
faqs.question6: How do my deposits earn interest?
faqs.answer6: Flex uses an API with Compound Finance to lend your deposits to a liquidity pool. Others borrow from the pool in return for putting up collateral, and you earn the interest. In other words, Flex is very similar to how investments work on Constant, only with Flex you can withdraw anytime.
faqs.answer7:
Not always, no. While held with our trust partner, Prime Trust, your deposits are covered by a $130,000,000 insurance policy. However, we expect deposits will spend most of their time earning interest through Compound Finance, so will instead be protected by collateral put up by Compound's users.

Earn interest on your deposits or insure them?
faqs.question8: Can I deposit collateral or other cryptocurrency into Flex?
faqs.answer8: At the moment, Flex only accepts USD and USD-backed stablecoins.
faqs.question9: Can I earn interest while waiting for an investment order to match?
faqs.answer9: No, your funds are set aside while waiting for a match so won't earn interest on Flex. If you decide to cancel the order, your funds will return to earning interest in Flex.
faqs.answer10: The interest rate depends on supply and demand in Compound's lending market. Sometimes it's higher, sometimes it's lower, but for the time being we've fixed this at 4% APY.
faqs.answer11: No – all deposits and withdrawals on Flex are free.
faqs.answer12: Flex deposits earn interest through an API with Compound Finance, another lending platform. Compound sets interest rates according to supply and demand, and Constant will make a slim profit on any difference between the Flex and Compound rates.

info.title: Get your friends involved
info.desc:
For every friend who makes an investment or loan of $1000 or more, you will earn 1 STAR.

1 STAR unlocks either +1% APR on an investment or -1% APR on a loan. You can use up to 3 STAR at one time.

Apply your STAR to any investment or loan matched after 20 August 2019, or send to a friend if you’re feeling generous.

list.statusDesc:
There are 3 steps to earn STAR.

faqs.answer1: Unlike bank loans, P2P lending works by matching investors and borrowers directly. Since there are no greedy middlemen getting in the way, you set your own terms and rates, giving you unparalleled control of your finances. So whether you’re looking for a low-interest loan or better returns on your investment, we’ll match you with someone who’d love to do business with you.
faqs.answer2:
STAR is an ERC20 token which can be redeemed for 1% bonus or discounted interest, or sent to someone as a gift. 1 STAR unlocks either +1% APR on an investment or -1% APR on a loan. You can use up to 3 STAR at one time.

The great news is all STAR rewards apply to the whole term. To redeem STAR, simply go to your Accounts page and select an active loan or investment
faqs.question3: Can I trade STAR on exchanges?
faqs.answer3: No, not yet. STAR is only usable on the Constant platform but can still be transferred to other ERC20 wallets. Check out the smart contract on Etherscan.
faqs.question4: What makes Constant different from other P2P lending platforms?
faqs.answer4:
Constant is the first fully secured P2P lending platform. All investor funds are 150% backed by cryptocurrency collateral. Borrower collateral is stored safely in escrow, which means no one can touch it until it is transferred back to the borrower after repayment.

Unlike other platforms, Constant also allows users to set their own interest rates and terms. Ethereum powered smart contracts automate the loan agreement and always run exactly as programmed – ensuring both investors and borrowers are protected.
faqs.answer5: Anyone can participate, as long as you have an internet connection (to use our website) and sign up for an account on Constant to receive your reward in STAR.
faqs.answer6: Either on October 31 2019 or when all 10,000 STAR have been rewarded.
faqs.question7: How can I track STAR rewards?
faqs.answer7: At the end of the campaign, we’ll publish the results for your reference. In the meantime, you can ask for help from our admins on the STARdrop Telegram group.

1.question: What is a masternode?
1.answer: A masternode is a member of a blockchain network that stores an entire copy of the blockchain on their computer at all times. They’re vital to maintaining and securing a blockchain network. To qualify as a masternode, you must first stake a large amount of a blockchain’s native cryptocurrency, which incentivizes the right behavior and discourages fraud. In return for helping maintain the network, masternodes receive a cryptocurrency reward.

2.question: What is a masternode pool?
2.answer: Rather than one person staking the minimum amount to become a masternode, a masternode pool crowdsources the cryptocurrency from multiple people on the network. This makes it easier to become a masternode for people without the minimum stake, and distributes the rewards among a greater number of people. As a masternode pool further decentralizes a network, it could also be argued it is more secure and democratic.

3.question: Will the staking rewards ever change?
3.answer: The interest you earn for staking in the masternode pool depends on the blockchain. It’ll be fixed for the beginning of your staking term, but might change during your term or the next time you stake. We’ll make it clear just how much you’ll earn through our masternode pool before you send your cryptocurrency.

4.question: Which cryptocurrencies do you support?
4.answer: Our first masternode pool will be for TomoChain. You’ll be able to stake TOMO for a reward of {reward}%. We’ll add other masternode pools in time.

5.question: Where is my cryptocurrency stored?
5.answer: Like all masternodes, your cryptocurrency is stored in a smart contract escrow on the blockchain. Constant doesn’t take custody of your cryptocurrency. You can verify your stake at any time using your cryptocurrency’s blockchain explorer.

6.question: Can I withdraw my stake at anytime?
6.answer: Yes, you can withdraw your stake and earned interest at any time. However, to avoid network disruption, withdrawing from a masternode is not instant. Actual withdrawal times vary by blockchain. For TOMO, for example, withdrawals will take two days. As we add more cryptocurrencies to the masternode pool we’ll advise withdrawal times for each one.

7.question: How is interest paid?
7.answer: Interest is paid directly into your Constant account every 30 minutes. You’ll receive interest in the same cryptocurrency as the one you stake. For example, if you’re staking TOMO, you’ll earn TOMO interest. This is common across multiple blockchains.

8.question: Can I stake using loan collateral?
8.answer: Yes. If you’re borrowing against your collateral through our platform, you can offset the staking rewards against the cost of the loan. Exactly how much you can offset depends on your collateral, the staking rewards, and the duration of your staking and borrowing term. We’ll determine this mathematically and give you a revised rate before you begin staking.

block1.title: Why use our API?
block1.desc:
Whether you’re an institutional partner or want to whitelabel our tech, our API opens new ways to interact with and exploit the Constant platform.
  • Launch your own whitelabel DeFi product.
  • Add lending to your product suite.
  • Verify and authenticate customers.
  • Automate lending strategies.
  • Support a vast number of digital assets.
  • Add extra utility to your platform or project.
    • Our API lets you program new software, services, and products without spending a fortune on engineering your own tech. Instead, seamlessly interface with our platform to offer everything we do and more.

block2.title: What can you do with it?
block2.desc:
Here’s a brief overview of our API services.
Invest, Borrow, and Deposit
  • Browse our open order book. Give your customers access to the best deals in our P2P lending market.
  • Submit customized lending orders. Put customers in the driving seat with flexible rates and terms.
  • Earn interest on fiat and stablecoin deposits. Reward customers with a bank-beating interest rate on deposits, compounded and paid every second.
    • View balances and withdraw
  • Browse deposit history. Help your customers keep track of their spend.
  • View coin and fiat balances. Give customers insight into their digital assets and liquidity.
  • Withdraw cryptocurrencies and fiat. Support withdrawal of multiple assets, including USD, crypto, and USD-backed stablecoins.
    • Onboard new customers
  • Perform KYC checks. Verify the identity of customers to comply with AML (Anti Money Laundering) regulations.
  • Verify accounts. Reduce spam and improve the quality of your customer database.
  • Authenticate anyone. Help protect customer security and preserve the integrity of your platform through 2FA protocols.

consumerFinance.desc: As the new kid on the block, we get a lot of press. Journalists cover everything from our invesment products to the flexibility and support you get along the way. Find out what finance’s most respected publications think about us below.

1.name: Inc.
1.desc: Constant which allows borrowers and lenders to transact directly. Banks, brokers and other third parties are cut off from any deal, and therefore access to financial data is minimized. Constant lowers borrowing costs by removing middlemen, and thereby streamlining processes.

2.name: Entrepreneur
2.desc: Constant acts as a trading hub where borrowers and creditors pick the best deal. Moreover, the Redlands, Calif.-based venture allows users to set their own interest rates and terms -- a feature that doesn’t exist anywhere else.

3.name: ZeroHedge
3.desc: Lenders can choose their terms, no credit check, and no nonsense – and find borrowers. Programming a system like this using the US banking system, would be expensive, cumbersome, time consuming, and who knows what it might look like after all the regulatory approvals.

technology.title: Technology
technology.desc: Technology is our heart, and customers are our lifeblood. We combine the two to build products that make a positive difference to people’s lives.

1.name: Hackernoon
1.desc: The traditional loan agreement has been replaced by an unstoppable Ethereum smart contract without any possibility of downtime, fraud, or third-party interference. Fully-secured, blockchain-enabled P2P lending is our contribution to a bankless banking system.

2.name: Techworm
2.desc: The best thing about Constant, however, is the security the lending platform has in place. Every loan is fully secured and backed in multiple ways. While on loan it’s protected by borrower collateral, and while waiting to be matched it’s protected by a $130M insurance policy.

3.name: TechBullion
3.desc: Constant works by enabling borrowers to stake liquid capital via over-collateralized crypto assets (e.g., Ether) based on an LTV ratio. Subsequently, borrowers can “cherrypick” the best deals enumerated on Constant’s interface, selecting the best interest rates that are posted independently by each lending peer.

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.desc: We believe in the future of blockchain and are proud members of the crypto community. As our voice has grown, the crypto press has helped tell our story to the world.

1.name: CoinSpeaker
1.desc: And when it comes to pioneering a new generation of fintech platforms, Constant provides a measuring stick for the industry’s progress.

2.name: Blockonomi
2.desc: Constant has created a platform that cuts banks out of the lending equation and allows anyone in the world to create loans on whatever terms they like. This is a big shift away from the established lending system, and it could be a big benefit for both borrowers and lenders.

3.name: CryptoGazette
3.desc: Constant, a leading secured P2P lending platform, has been expanding its service and product offerings in recent months as it continues to originate more loans on its Ethereum-based lending service.

4.name: EndofTheChain
4.desc: It's a great service, with free deposits and withdrawals, extremely fast responding customer support and a transparent team.

5.name: Coin98
5.desc: Chắc hẳn sẽ có những lúc chúng ta rơi vào hoàn cảnh khi đang HODL một đồng coin nào đó, nhưng lại thấy 1 cơ hội khác trong khi quỹ vốn thì đã hết. Constant sẽ giúp anh em huy động được một lượng cash (tiền mặt) nhất định để vào được kèo mới nhưng không phải cash out (bán) đồng coin đang HODL.

0.title: Prime Trust
0.desc: Prime Trust is the independent, accredited custodian of our USD reserve. When you deposit, Prime Trust stores your money across multiple bank accounts insured to a total of $130,000,000.

1.title: BitGo
1.desc: BitGo is our approved custodian of digital asset collateral. When you borrow against a BitGo-supported cryptocurrency, your collateral is sent to a BitGo escrow insured to $100,000,000.

cb.title: Checkbook
cb.desc: Checkbook helps settle withdrawals via ACH and digital cheque, making transfers cheaper for US residents.

qc.title: QCP Capital
qc.desc: QCP Capital helps manage collateral and offers occasional trading services.

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.desc: We’ve signed partnerships with blockchain’s biggest movers and shakers. Together, we work hard to help you do more with your assets.

vip.name: CZ Binance
vip.desc: Some much appreciated "competition" to @binance lending. Let's grow together!

history.title: History
history.redeemDesc: Membership rewards are paid after you've reviewed us on TrustPilot. If you've reviewed us already, your rewards will go straight into your account. Otherwise, click the Unlock Your Rewards button below to submit your TrustPilot username and claim your rewards.

1.question: Do the minimum investment/borrow amounts apply to single loans only?
1.answer: No, you can invest or borrow multiple times within the 180 days to become a Gold, Platinum, or Diamond member.

2.question: Do outstanding loans and investments qualify for points?
2.answer: Yes. You can meet the minimum threshold for membership on active loans and investments that are yet to mature.

3.question: Can I combine loans and investments to reach the membership threshold?
3.answer: No. The membership thresholds apply separately to loans and investments. For example, you must invest $25,000 or borrow $25,000 to qualify for Gold membership.

4.question: How long do membership rewards last?
4.answer:
The $50 cashback rewards and STAR bonus are one-off rewards only. The other benefits last as long as your points do. You earn a point for every dollar you invest or borrow and each point expires after 180 days. So, if you make a single investment of $25,000, for example, your points will last 180 days and so will the benefits.

If you invest several times to reach the minimum, your rewards will last 180 days from the first qualifying point you earned. For example, if you invest $10,000 and then $15,000 three months later, your benefits will continue until your first batch of points expire.

5.question: Can I extend membership rewards?
5.answer: Yes! When your points expire, simply invest or borrow again to top them up. This way, you can keep your membership benefits for as long as you want them.

6.question: Do I need to contact you when I’ve reached the minimum amount?
6.answer: No, you don’t need to do anything. We’ll track your investment and loan volume on a rolling six-month basis and when you meet the minimum threshold, we’ll immediately upgrade you to Gold, Platinum, or Diamond status.

7.question: Why is there an expiration date on membership points?
7.answer: While there is an expiration date on points there is no expiration date on the Membership Rewards program. This is our way of saying thank you to our most loyal and active customers, so we want to run the program for as long as possible. The expiration date allows us to tie membership strictly to active, regular users of our platform.

8.question: Can you qualify for each level multiple times?
8.answer: Yes, you can. However, the $150 and STAR bonuses can only be claimed once during the lifetime of your account. You can maintain the other benefits indefinitely.

9.question: Can I earn all the benefits at once?
9.answer: Interest from referrals is exclusive to each level of membership. The instant credit reward can each be earned only one time per each level. For example, if you invest $100,000, you’ll get $150 + 1 STAR + 20% of earned interest from referred friends’ Flex accounts (until your membership points expire).

10.question: How do I redeem STAR?
10.answer: By going to your Accounts page you can redeem STAR against any active investment or loan. 1 STAR = +/- 1% interest (depending on if you’re a lender or borrower). The bonus or discount is applied from the date of redemption until the loan or investment matures. STAR tokens don’t expire, so you can save them up and redeem them in one go if you want.

11.question: What happens when my points expire?
11.answer: You can top points up to maintain your membership benefits. Your Membership Rewards page shows when your points expire and you’ll also receive an email reminder from us too. If you allow your points to expire, you will lose your membership and benefits, but can always re-qualify by earning enough points. Please note the $150 and STAR bonuses are one-time benefits — you can only earn them once per level.

12.question: Will my referral interest change when my points expire?
12.answer: As stated above, if you allow your points to expire, you will lose your membership and benefits. This includes bonus referral interest rates. However, all special interest rates from friends you refer will be upgraded upon achieving membership.

13.question: Do I have to complete 3 Trustpilot reviews to get all $150?
13.answer: When you reach a new membership level you will be prompted to leave a review on our Trustpilot. Once you click the link to our Trustpilot on our membership page and enter your username your reward will be automatically credited to your account. If you have done this once you never have to do it again. Thanks for spreading the word about our platform :).

14.question: I am already a member. Can I claim an additional $50 or STAR reward for my current level?
14.answer:
If you’re already participating in our membership program then, first of all, thank you! But since you’ve already received a reward for your current level, you must move up a level to receive new rewards.

For example: if you are already a Gold member you won’t be able to earn $50 cashback for Gold again but can gain $50 rewards if you upgrade to Platinum or Diamond. If you’re already a Diamond member you’ll be unable to receive further one-time rewards from any level as you already have earned them.

You will, however, be able to receive all extra interest and rewards on your new referrals based on your current level as well as its new withdrawal/deposit options.

redeemPopup.messageConfirm: To unlock your rewards, please review us on TrustPilot. Then enter your TrustPilot username below and click Submit. Your rewards will be released to your account immediately.

b1.title2: Thanks for visiting our  secured P2P lending  platform.
b1.content1:
If it’s your first time here, I’d love to tell you a little about who we are and what we do.

Like many stories, ours has a few twists and turns. So let’s rewind to January 2019 when it all began…

Back then, we were a humble stablecoin project. A team of economists, engineers, and creatives looking to make money more useful.

b2.title1: Back then, we were a humble stablecoin project
b2.content1:
We had developed an efficient, borderless, and stable digital currency, backed by the US Dollar, which we launched at CES 2019 in Las Vegas.

Our stablecoin (CONST) offered stability for people in troubled economies:

- It cut the cost of international transfers.

- It slashed processing times from days to minutes.

- gave everyone access to a free USD account.

But we wanted to do more…

b3.title1: We wanted to help people grow their money.
b3.content1:
Like the rest of the world, we’d experienced first-hand the problems with traditional banking. The miserable interest rates, the huge fees, the slow, inefficient systems…

So, we began thinking about how we could pay a great interest rate on our stablecoin.

Digital currencies are versatile. They move quickly, freely, and are protected by the blockchain technology underpinning them – surely we could put those efficiency savings to work?

After a lot of discussion, we set our sights on an industry that – until now – has had a mixed reputation: peer-to-peer (P2P) lending.

The problem with P2P lending, as we saw it, was too much centralization and too little use of collateral. P2P lenders were doing what banks did – setting rates, evaluating risk, and so on.

Ultimately, this takes control away from you, the customer.

So, we built a P2P lending platform that would do two things:

1.content:
Give you control over amounts, rates, and terms.

We’re the only P2P lending platform in the world to offer this (as far as we know).

2.content: Secure all lending with collateral. This protects your funds and means we never do credit checks.

b4.content2: Helping people across the world get the cash they need to do the things they want.

b6.title1: Our P2P lending platform is internationally recognized as one of the most flexible, transparent, and rewarding.
b6.content1: Our team has grown to over 50, spread across California, Vietnam, Malta, and Hong Kong.
b6.content2: We’re the fastest-growing P2P lender in SE Asia, and have featured in HackerNoon, ZeroHedge, Inc., and many other popular tech and finance publications.

b7.content1:
And as you’ve probably guessed by reading this far, we’re not done yet...

Our goal is to give you the best financial tools in the world and the expertise to use them.

That means continuous development of our technology, making it faster, cheaper, and more secure, and giving you all the helpful content you need to take advantage of it.
b7.title2: Our job is to help you do more with your money.
b7.content2: To give you great interest rates on investments and easy access to credit when you need it.

b8.content1:
No, we’re not perfect, but we’re honest about our shortcomings and dedicated to improving.

Something broken? Get in touch

Want a new feature? Let us know

Got a question? We’re always here for you.

Our customer service team works 24/7, providing round-the-clock support no matter wherer you live.

We promise you'll always have a say in the development of the Constant platform...

Because we built it for you
